channel.title: Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery short story, novella & novel website. Buy thrilling murder mystery & crime stories to read on any ebook device or app.

item.title: The Devil Takes A Hand
item.dc:creator: Ward Sterling
item.description: Tennant wanted his insane wife dead if he couldn't divorce her, and he'd found the perfect plan. But would he succeed or would the devil take a hand first?

item.title: After Midnight
item.dc:creator: Marthé Neville
item.description: Willoughby is jealous of his wife's relationship with the new gardner. But who is the mysterious man and how does a faithful wife's relationship with him lead to murder?

item.title: Start With A Corpse
item.dc:creator: Larry Holden
item.description: Why was it that no one wanted it known just whom the Rutherford girl had killed?

item.title: Brothers of the Coast
item.dc:creator: J. C. Kofoed
item.description: What magic did the Chinaman Hong Fat spin on Holyoak? Is he a sailor deserting his ship in 1921 Port Royal, or Holyoak the murderous pirate under Captain Morgan, attacking the fort of Panama, centuries ago …

item.title: The Trap Thief
item.dc:creator: Hy S. Watson & Asa Steele
item.description: “The low-down sneaking thief!” Jack Ramsey’s wrath hissed on his lips as he flung the steel traps to the ground. Of thirty, all but two had been stolen.

item.title: The Case of the Social Climbers

image.title: The Case of the Social Climbers

item.description: Will John Burton's ruse win him love and social status or will it just end up being a silly game of make-believe that leads to murder?

item.title: The "Snitch"
item.dc:creator: Mert E. Smith
item.description: Jimmy Dolan, No. 7774, must be on his best behavior if he’s going to get out of the big pen, verify the message and exact revenge on the man who snitched.

item.title: The Red Serpent
item.dc:creator: Seabury Quinn
item.description: Quinn cuts loose with both barrels in this story. Strange events, eerie happenings, a sinister plot, an atmosphere of weird mystery — you will find them all here. And they make your scalp bristle. … Professor Forrester, detective extraordinary, is all but baffled by the mysterious death of his friend and colleague, Professor Jonas Podkin. Rosalie, however, aids him no little in untangling the skein of the riddle. The girl is become almost as clever as her sagacious Uncle Harvey. … By and large, here’s a neat bit of work and a good story — as thrilling a thing as we’ve read this year. — E. B.

item.title: Deuces Dealt for Death
item.dc:creator: Glenn Low
item.description: Slitting the throat of the fourth of Clinsey's quartet quarry should be as easy as falling off a log, that vengeance stayer figured. But Clinsey should have known that when success goes to a kilter's head, it may be even easier for him to fall from a gallows first.

item.title: The Case of the Chiming Clock

image.title: The Case of the Chiming Clock

item.description: The timing of the rain clues criminologist Dixon Hawke into the falsity of the alibi based on the chiming of the clock.
